body.name: RASOO Chest of Drawer 6 Drawers Dressers Chest for Bedroom Cabinet Tall Grey Bedside Drawers Wide Storage Space Sidetable Dresser Chest (6 Drawers, Grey)
features: Durability & Solidity - This chest of drawers constructed by MDF board, this cabinet features solidity and durability. The medium density fiberboard won't be affected with damp and won't deform like normal wood after years of using.
Large Storage Space - 6 drawers are openble which offers great convenience for storage inside. Spacious Drawer for displaying or storage your tools in the drawer chest.
Versatile and Practical - Storage dresser in your living room or bedroom. Create your own casual yet sideboard, enjoy extra storage in your home with this sideboard.

Elegant Design & High quality - High quality of hardware metal part give you good touching feeling. Excellent 3 times painting process to insure the sideboard not easy to drop paint, smoother. After finish, 40.6 KGs net weight and each board has 18mm (more 3mm than market average) thickness makes it better quality. Safety round corner craft garantte you and your children safety.

Excellent After Sales Service: Free replacement or money back for any reason within 30 days, Lifetime warranty on accessories. Customer satisfaction has always been our pursuit, if you are unhappy with our products, please do not hesitate to contact us for help.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Storage dresser in your living room or bedroom!Exquisite surface,space-saving,simple and elegant colorBring you Comfortable life!

Features: We have 3 times painting process（two times primer painting and one time surface）,made of E1 degree good quality MDF materia, which won't easily be affected with damp and won't be deformed. Each board of the dresser has 18mm（more 3mm than market average）) thickness which makes it better quality and stronger. The sturdy top can put on your books, alarm clock, ,phone, and whatever you like.Two small drawer on the top equipped, four larger drawers for clothing. Drawer support under each drawer for a sturdy long lasting chest.

Speicification: Color: White/GreyMaterial: Painted CARB-Certified P2 MDF & Metal HardwareBoard Thickness: each board has 18mm（more 3mm than market average）Overall Dimension: 27.56 x 15.75 x 40.15" (LxWxH)Package Size: 44.65" x 19.92" x 8.86"(LxWxH)N.W.:89.51 lbG.W.: 97.00 lb

Invisible Door Handle The invisible Drawer handle expresses the simple and elegant design concept.It's contemporary design and clean lines coordinates with any home Family decoration Steel Tube Legs Steel tube legs with rubber pads are slip resistance and waterproof，which is greatly enlarged the safety and versatility of the products. Metal drawer slide Metal slides slide for the drawers can make them more smooth and good touching feeling when you pull open the drawers.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 19, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars It’s a solid built dresser
reviews.reviewText: I love how sturdy it is and the look is great! It took some time to put together and I feel like most buyers would struggle to assemble it, but it’s definitely worth it!! I love it

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 30, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Nice and sturdy!
reviews.reviewText: Nice and sturdy. Looks great. A lot of pieces to put together and one of the boards for the drawer came broken. There was no problem getting a replacement board.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 15, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars measurements are not accurate
reviews.reviewText: the measurements provided are wrong! it looks like polly pocket furniture. Not very sturdy and directions are confusing

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 6, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars The cabinet make my home shipshape!
reviews.reviewText: This cabinet looks of good quality and the white color goes well with my home. The product didn’t have any damaged and smell when i received it.It is very practical!It has a large capacity, can put a lot of clothes, toys, bags snacks and so on,my house is no longer a mess!And the drawer slides are smooth,my children and I are very satisfied. Details are also particularly good, the corner of the cabinet is round, don’t afraid of accidentally hit. The top one layer has two smaller drawers, receive small article conveniently. It is also convenient to install only you follow the instructions.It's not the cheapest cabinet,But it must be the best value of money.All in all, it's a very satisfying product,GET IT!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 20, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Sturdy perfect for baby/toddler
reviews.reviewText: OKAY!!!! After 6 hours trying to assemble this is my opinion: solid however drawers are not as deep as I prefer, should be 5 drawers instead for more room. Instructions SUCK!!! The bracket position is hard to determine since they don’t indicate which direction to put them. I of course had them backwards. Then once I had them right I thought just one more screw for them to attach the drawer WRONG!!! This was the worse part the screw is BARELY long enough to catch. I have put together lots of IKEA & Walmart pieces & I have never had such a difficult time with assembly. If it wasn’t the perfect size for the space needed I would have given up & returned it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 16, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great, drawers a little shallow but everything fit and looks great
reviews.reviewText: Easy to assemble.. All you need is a Phillips head screwdriver to assemble. Wish I paid attention to the deoth of the drawers but I love it.. Only downfall is I'm missing screws Q which hold the Brackets to the drawers to slide in and out. UPDATE: SCREWS NOT MISSING labeled wrong

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 2, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I bought this two years ago and it's falling apart. The ball bearing strips that let the drawer slide have fallen/broken out of two drawers. I can't close or open 4 out of 6 drawers a good majority of the time.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 10, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Very sturdy, nice dresser
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. I really liked this dresser, it took me a few hours to put it together as the instructions were only pictures and some of them can be easily mixed up, so I had to re-dp a couple of steps bc I got them "up side down" but overall not too bad. The side, up and down panels are solid and could be heavy to move, which makes it worth the price (not your regular cheap made-up-wood). Sadly, the upper right small drawer doesn't close well bc the way it's built (the holes of the rails are more forward compared to the left side) but it doesn't look too bad. That's why I gave it only 4/5 stars.
